All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    BC
    Implements a means to create an (currently) in-memory blockchain.
    BCFuncTest
    Defines a class for testing general blockchain functionality.
    BCUtil
    Contains both static and non-static (singleton) helper methods that provide useful functionality for the blockchain.
    Block
    Implements a Block in a blockchain system.
    Hashable  
    Header
    Represents a block header in a blockchain system.
    IllegalOperationException
    Defines a custom exception that tracks illegal operations performed within jchain.
    MerkleTree<T extends Hashable>
    Defines a generic MerkleTree structure that generates root hashes for use in cryptographic operations.
    Miner
    Represents a miner in the jchain system.
    MiningHarnessTest
    Test harness for mining.
    NoSuchBlockException
    Thrown when retrievals either by height or by hash are made for blocks and the block does not exist or there was some other error retreiveing the block.
    NoSuchTransactionException
    Thrown when a request is made for a Transaction via its hash and it is not found.
    Output
    Represents an output in a Transaction.
    Publisher<V>  
    Subscriber<V>
    Defines an interface for objects to receive items.
    TestBC
    Contains setup code for automatically launching and running test against the jchain codebase.
    Transaction  
    TxnMemoryPool
    Used by miners to simulate an in-memory transaction pool.
